Articles.Content: Hey I am looking for a specific mod/part that I used before, it was a parts pack with a mk3 cockpit with a nose that can tilt. I believe it was named something like SST or that but I can't remember what mod pack it came with or find any mention of it anywhere at all. Any help would be appreciated as it was the perfect part for Concorde style planes.
That's the one, thank you very much I spent ages looking for it.
